item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, my name is Julia Rizza and I’ve been coding software since I was 14. It was a very fun hobbie at the time, and I ended up making it my profession. Today I work with backend development of web APIs, besides venturing into the world of frontend and, at one time or another, work with big data. Also, I like to share knowledge and build up courses about what I learn, so you may bump into one of my courses around the web.
